sentences.en: Another thing you can do is save the worksheet and send it to somebody else.
sentences.cn: 您可以做的另一件事情是保存工作表并将其发送给其他人。

sentences.en: Cannot use this list functionality on a protected worksheet.
sentences.cn: 在受保护的工作表上无法使用此列表功能.

sentences.en: Complete this worksheet before you decide on the model you want.
sentences.cn: 在你确定课程之前，先完成这个活页练习题。

sentences.en: Generally speaking, the worksheet can be used to present and analyze data.
sentences.cn: 一般而言, 工作表可以用于展现和分析数据.

sentences.en: How to copy the value out of a message box and hold in the memory so the result can be pasted into any cell on a worksheet.
sentences.cn: 如何将值从一个消息框，并保持在记忆中这样的结果可以被粘贴到工作表上的任何细胞。

sentences.en: If click a worksheet cell, the cell changes to edit mode.
sentences.cn: 当双击工作表单元格时, 该单元格将切换到编辑模式.

sentences.en: If you do this to each worksheet item your test case script looks similar to Listing 6.
sentences.cn: 如果您对每个工作表条目这样做，您的测试脚本看起来类似于列表6。

sentences.en: Meet two conditions to the query and reference data another worksheet?
sentences.cn: 满足两个条件来查询并引用另一工作表的数据?

sentences.en: Prepare and i ue the meeting notice to the participants , including the completed retro ective plaing worksheet.
sentences.cn: 准备并给与会者发出会议通知，同时发出已完成的回顾计划工作表。

sentences.en: Select a worksheet, macro sheet or chart sheet.
sentences.cn: 选定工作表、宏表或图表工作表。

sentences.en: Text extends beyond worksheet. Some text will be lost.
sentences.cn: 文字长度超出工作表外, 会丢失部分文字.

sentences.en: The worksheet should be as interactive and flexible as possible.
sentences.cn: 这份工作表应该尽可能与用户相互作用并且灵活使用.

sentences.en: This is an approach using mathematical programming based on a popu 1 ar worksheet.
sentences.cn: 该方案是基于流行电子表格软件的数学规划求优的通用解决方案.

sentences.en: This worksheet contains hidden rows or columns that the recipient can unhide.
sentences.cn: 此工作表包含隐藏的行或列,收件人可对这些行或列取消隐藏.

sentences.en: This worksheet provides space for planning your Rotary Foundation seminar.
sentences.cn: 此一工作表提供空间让你规划扶轮基金研讨会.

sentences.en: To map elements, drag the elements from the tree onto your worksheet.
sentences.cn: 若要映射元素, 请将元素从树拖动到工作表上.

sentences.en: To share this workbook, it must contain at least one visible worksheet.
sentences.cn: 共享工作簿至少需有一张以上可见工作表.

sentences.en: Where are the worksheet ranges that you want to consolidate?
sentences.cn: 请键入或选定包含汇总数据的工作表数据区域.

sentences.en: You can delete any worksheet in a workbook.
sentences.cn: 可以删除工作簿中的任何工作表.

sentences.en: You can manipulate the worksheet by adding columns and rows, including data from other sources, creating formulas for computations, and so on.
sentences.cn: 您可以通过添加列和行、包括其他来源的数据、创建用于计算的公式等，从而操作工作表。

sentences.en: You can programmatically check the spelling of words in a worksheet.
sentences.cn: 可以通过编程方式检查工作表中单词的拼写.

sentences.en: You can show or hide any worksheet in a workbook.
sentences.cn: 可以在工作簿中显示或隐藏任何工作表.

trans.tran_en: a piece of paper with questions and exercises for students
